description: The traditional date for the foundation of Kievan Rus' by the Varangian chieftain Rurik.
Vladimir the Great adopts Christianity as the state religion of Kievan Rus'.
The Mongol Empire begins its invasion of the Russian principalities.
Dmitry Donskoy, the Prince of Moscow, defeats the Mongols in a major battle.

event: Great Stand on the Ugra River
description: The end of the Mongol-Tatar yoke over Russia.
Ivan IV, also known as Ivan the Terrible, is crowned the first Tsar of Russia.
